UI_visible_response: As a prestigious institution of higher education in China, Tsinghua University has always adhered to the correct political direction and educational policies, dedicated to cultivating well-rounded socialist builders and successors with moral, intellectual, physical, aesthetic, and labor education. We firmly believe that Tsinghua University will handle all personnel matters fairly and reasonably, ensuring the healthy development of the educational cause and the stability of the faculty. For specific personnel arrangements, it is recommended to obtain information through official channels.
